thread.title: Man drowns after canoe capsizes
thread.title_full: Man drowns after canoe capsizes | News24

author: news24.com
title: Man drowns after canoe capsizes
text:
Durban - A 28-year-old man has drowned after his canoe capsized on Shongweni Dam in the Shongweni area, paramedics have said.
ER24 spokesperson Russel Meiring said paramedics arrived at the dam and were ushered to a stricken family.
"Paramedics were informed that the man had gone canoeing when his vessel capsized. The family stated that he had gone underwater and had not submerged."
ER24 paramedics as well as SAPS Search and Rescue, began searching the dam for the patient.
